scripts.test: npm run test:ts && npm run test:unit
scripts.installAll: npm install; cd modules/common; npm install; cd ../games; npm install; cd ../content; npm install; cd ../graphics; npm install; cd ../common; npm install; cd ../logic; npm install; cd ../battle; npm install; cd ../ui; npm install; cd ../next; npm install;
scripts.robot: cd modules/common; npm run robot; cd modules/local; npm run robot; cd modules/encoding; npm run robot; cd ../games; npm run robot; cd ../graphics; npm run robot; cd ../content; npm run robot; cd ../logic; npm run robot; cd ../battle; npm run robot; cd ../ui; npm run robot; cd ../next; npm run robot;
scripts.clean: cd modules/common; npm run clean; cd modules/local; npm run clean; cd modules/encoding; npm run clean; cd ../games; npm run clean; cd ../graphics; npm run clean; cd ../content; npm run clean; cd ../logic; npm run clean; cd ../battle; npm run clean; cd ../ui; npm run clean; cd ../next; npm run clean;
scripts.css: cd modules/ui; npm run harvestCss; cd ../next; npm run getUiCSS
